auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.redirectingToDashboard: You are already logged in. Redirecting to dashboard.
auth.accountCreated: Your account has been created successfully
auth.logoutMessage: You have been logged out successfully
auth.redirectingToLogin: You need to be logged in to access this page. Redirecting to login...
auth.emailExists: A user with this email already exists

errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.passwordMaxLength: Password must be at most 24 characters
errors.passwordLetter: Password must contain at least one letter
errors.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
errors.passwordFormat: Password can only contain Latin letters, numbers, and special characters
errors.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 5 characters long
errors.usernameFormat: Username can only contain Latin letters, _ and -

errors.nameFullRequired: Please enter full name (first and last name)
errors.namePartLength: Each part of your name must be at least 3 characters
errors.phoneLength: Phone number must be 10 characters long
errors.phoneFormat: Phone number can only contain numbers, spaces, + and -
errors.addressLength: Address must be at least 10 characters long

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeDescription: This is your secure dashboard where you can manage your account and access banking services.

home.title: Secure Banking Platform
home.subtitle: Access your accounts securely and manage your finances with ease.
home.secureDescription: Advanced security features with JWT authentication and password hashing to protect your data.
home.userFriendlyDescription: Modern, responsive design with Next.js and Tailwind CSS for a seamless user experience.

register.title: Registration of a new user
register.description: This registration form is only filled in if you do not have a username and password for the Virtual Banking Branch (e-fibank) of FIB. If you already have a username and password, adding access to a new individual or legal entity is done at the bank. If you have forgotten your username and/or password, please visit the bank to receive them.
